source_text.raw_block:
Hypnotic Pattern (Illusion/Phantasm)
Range: 30 yards
Components: S, M
Duration: Special
Casting Time: 2
Area of Effect: %foot cube
SavingThrow: Neg.
When this spell is cast, the wizard Creates
a weaving, twisting pattern of subtle colors
in the air. This pattern causes any creature
looking at it to become fascinated and stand
gazing at it as long as the spellcaster main
tains the display, plus two rounds there
after. The spell can captivate a maximum o
24 levels, or Hit Dice, of creatures (e.g., 21
creatures with 1 Hit Die each, 12 with 2 Hii
Dice, etc). All creatures affected must bc
within the area of effect, and each is entitlec
to a saving throw vs. spell. A damage
inflicting attack on an affected creature fre
it from the spell immediately.
The mage need not utter a sound, but he
must gesture appropriately while holding a
glowing stick of incense or a crystal rod
filled with phosphorescent material.
